Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.server

[Groovy] Class ConfigFileListener

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.server.ConfigFileListener
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      FileListener

      @Log4j
@TypeChecked
class ConfigFileListener

      This FileListener whatches a Camel XML configuration and loads changes in the given CamelContext.

      Authors:
      cmahnke
